article_title: Can It Be True? Medicaid Will Cost More In States That Refused Expansion?

article_metadata.description: During the Great Recession, Medicaid spending by states across the country slowed to a crawl. That changes with the new fiscal year. budget (Photo credit: 401(K) 2013) Medicaid spending growth across the nation will more than double in the next year over Fiscal 2013, the result of the Patient Protection and Affordable [...]
